0.0.3.name: wordpress/simple-link
0.0.3.description:
This is a simple plugin that enables you to add hyperlinks to a post on selected text with just a click! Also you can easily find certain post that you want to add hyperlink to using the searching feature supplied by the plugin. It works well with the default editor of WordPress as well as FCKeditor.

The next release will contain an option page. You can configurate basic settings such as how many post buttons to display, etc.
